headline: RTX Receives $352 Million Contracts for Missile Systems
summary: RTX Corporation (NYSE:RTX) ranks among the top picks for a retirement portfolio. The US Department of War reported that on September 26, RTX Corporation (NYSE:RTX) received several defense contracts worth about $352.6 million for a range of missile systems and associated services. The most substantial award is a $160.9 million contract modification for the AIM-9X […]
